pillsgen:
Hold it in hand and use it with primary use key (default: right click) to regain a bit of your sanity. The empty bottle will be thrown on the floor and is no longer useable. 
The amount of player sanity that is replenished depends on the played difficulty: 
Amateur - 40% 
Intermediate - 35% 
Professional - 30%
Nightmare - 25% 
Insanity - 20%
